name.zh: 多日徒步登山背包（多颜色）

description.en: A multi-day hiking backpack designed for outdoor adventures. Features a tall main compartment, multi-point compression straps, and a supportive back system for long carry. OEM/ODM customization available for capacity, fabrics (including recycled options), colorways, logo patch, pocket layout, zippers & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 多日徒步/登山背包，适合户外长距离背负。高主仓设计，配多点压缩带与背负系统，满足长时间携带需求。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：容量规格、面料（可选再生环保材料）、配色、Logo 工艺、口袋结构、拉链五金与包装等。

en: Outer: High-density Nylon / Polyester (customizable; recycled options available)
Back System: Breathable mesh + foam/EVA padding (customizable)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Hardware: Duraflex-style buckles / custom hardware options
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：高密度尼龙/涤纶（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
背负系统：透气网布 + 海绵/EVA 衬垫（可定制）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
五金：Duraflex 类扣具/可选定制五金

en.Support: Padded back panel + adjustable shoulder straps + chest strap (optional) + hip belt (optional)
en.Features: Compression straps, multi-pocket organization, trekking-ready design
en.Customization: Capacity, fabric, color, logo, pocket layout, straps & hardware, packaging

zh.背负支撑: 加厚背板 + 可调节肩带 + 胸带（可选）+ 腰带（可选）
zh.功能特点: 压缩带、多口袋收纳、徒步登山适用
zh.可定制: 容量、面料配色、Logo、口袋结构、背带五金、包装
